title: Trump signs executive order to block "excessive" state AI regulations
description: President Trump has signed an executive order to block states from regulating artificial intelligence.

title: S&P 500, Dow Jones rise, NASDAQ falls as Wall Street hits record highs: Triller Group rises by 180%, Oriental Culture Holding sees big drop; check top gainers and losers
description: The movements in the stock market were dictated by disappointing Oracle results and worries about a potential bubble in artificial-intelligence technology.
content: Wall Street set records on Thursday (December 12, 2025) as two of the three key indices – S&P 500 and Dow Jones – ended green. The other key index NASDAQ composite, however, lagged and slipped 0.3% because of the weakness for AI stocks. The S&P 500 i... [948 chars]

title: Trump Signs Executive Order Targeting 'Excessive State Regulation' of AI, Will Launch Task Force To Challenge Laws 'Inconsistent' With Federal Policy
description: President Donald Trump signed a sweeping executive order aimed at creating a single national framework for artificial intelligence, moving to sideline state-level rules he argued were hindering America's ability to maintain its leadership in this space.

title: Trump signs executive order to block "patchwork" of state AI laws, seeks single national standard
description: US President Donald Trump on Thursday (local time) signed a sweeping Executive Order aimed at preventing a 'patchwork' of state-level artificial intelligence regulations, asserting that inconsistent rules threaten American innovation and weaken the country's global competitiveness in emerging technologies.

title: US to mandate AI vendors measure political bias for federal sales
description: WASHINGTON, Dec 11 (Reuters) - The U.S. government will require artificial intelligence vendors to measure political "bias" to sell their chatbots to federal agencies, according to a Trump administration statement released on Thursday.
content:
WASHINGTON, Dec 11 (Reuters) - The U.S. government will require artificial intelligence vendors to measure political "bias" to sell their chatbots to federal agencies, according to a Trump administration statement released on Thursday.

title: BYT Capital announces ₹180 crore early-stage fund focused on deep-tech and frontier engineering
description: India’s deep-tech startup ecosystem secured over $600 million in funding in 2025, propelled by developments in artificial intelligence, clean energy, and space technology
content:
BYT Capital, a deep-tech venture capital firm, announced the launch of its maiden ₹180 crore Category II AIF. The fund is created to back founders building at the frontier of scientific and engineering innovation.

title: Copyright Act may be updated for AI royalty
description: The government is considering changes to the Copyright Act. This is to create a system for paying royalties to creators whose work is used to train artificial intelligence. A committee has proposed a mandatory license for AI developers. This license would include payments to copyright holders. A central body would manage these royalty collections and distributions.
content:
